title: Humza Yousaf – 2023 Speech After Becoming SNP Leader and First Minister
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Humza Yousaf, the new leader of the SNP, on 27 March 2023.
content:
Can I thank the National Secretary for overseeing the ballot and our team at Headquarters for their efforts throughout this process.
